name: Intelligent Design Queen Quilt Set Boho Quilt Set, Watercolor Tie-Dye Coverlet Set, Casual & Trendy Quilted Lightweight Bedspread, All Season Bed Set, Shams, Cassiopeia, Full/Queen, Pink/Blue 4 Piece
short_description: Quilt/Sham: Printed Soft Brushed Microfiber Face, Solid Microfiber Reverse. Filling: Polyester, Channel Quiltling Pillow: Faux Fur Cover, Polyester Fill Fancy Tie Dye: Bring a splash of beautiful colors to your bedroom with the Cassiopeia Watercolor Tie Dye Printed Quilt Set. This full/queen coverlet set features a watercolor tie dye print & channel quilting for a colorful dreamy look Soft Microfiber - Upgrade your comfort with our Oeko-Tex Certified & Soft Microfiber Coverlet Set. Lightweight and cloud-like soft feel is perfect for all season comfort Ideal Gift Choice: This charming blue - pink quilt set featuring a delightful watercolor tie-dye color making it a perfect gift for girls, teens, and women on special occasions like Christmas, Thanksgiving, and birthdays Quilt set includes 1 Quilt: 88"W x 90"L, 2 Standard Shams:20"W x 26"L, 1 Throw Pillow:14"W x 14"L CARE INSTRUCTIONS - Machine washable. Use large capacity washer and dryer for best results. Cold/delicate cycle, low/no heat dry. Steam iron for wrinkles
product_description: Bring a splash of beautiful colors to your bedroom with the Intelligent Design Cassiopeia Watercolor Tie Dye Printed Quilt Set. This quilt features a watercolor tie dye print on channel quilting for a colorful dreamy look, and reverses to a coordinating aqua color. The 2 matching shams (1 in Twin/TwinXL) also have piped edges that pair perfectly with the quilt, and a square fur decorative pillow adds a chic textural touch. The hypoallergenic polyester quilt filling contains no allergens and is treated to be dustproof so you can sleep comfortably. This tie dye quilt set is also OEKO-TEX certified.

This coverlet is filled with a breathable cotton filling and features a soft microfiber face, giving your bed a cozy cottage look.

short_description: Package Includes: 1 cal king size quilt set (118x106") and 2 pillow shams (20" x 36") Transform your bedroom with this nature-inspired bedding set, featuring an elegant floral design that brings a fresh, countryside vibe into any space. Its timeless style blends beautifully with both modern decor and rustic settings, making it an ideal coverlet for creating a cozy, inviting atmosphere. With a plush 120GSM filling, this comforter is soft and lofty, providing the perfect balance of warmth and comfort. Whether you use it as a bedspread or a throw, it wraps you in luxurious softness. Crafted with special fabric treatments, this bedding set feels gentle against the skin, perfect for sensitive sleepers. Precision quilting techniques ensure that the filling stays in place, giving you a durable, high-quality coverlet that lasts. Versatile and practical, it’s designed for year-round comfort—use it as a quilt, a bed cover, a sofa throw, or an extra layer in air-conditioned rooms.
